: O

, O

for O

Center O
for O
Quantum O
Computing O
is O
looking O
to O
hire O
a O
Quantum O
Research O
Scientist O
. O
You O
will O
join O
a O
multi O
- O
disciplinary O
team O
of O
theoretical O
and O
experimental O
physicists O
, O
materials O
scientists O
, O
and O
hardware O

engineers O

at O

of O

technologies O
. O
Responsibilities O
include O

of O

communication O
tasks O
, O
protocol O
development O
for O
AWS O
infrastructure O
, O
research O
into O
use O
cases O
for O
advanced O

communications O

and O

quantum O

objectives O
. O
You O
have O

. O

. O

AWS O
파트너 O
네트워크와 O
협력을 O
통해 O
역동적이고 O
창의적으로 O
기업 O
고객의 O
트렌스포메이션 O
프로젝트를 O
지원하고 O
싶으십니까 O
? O
파트너가 O
고객의 O
클라우드 O
혁신을 O
지원 O
할 O

수 O
있도록 O
파트너 O
및 O
딜리버리 O
전략을 O
추진하고 O
, O
파트너의 O
프로젝트 O
지원을 O
평가 O
및 O
감독하며 O
클라우드 O
도입/적용을 O
가속화하기 O
위한 O
통찰력을 O
제공하는데 O
관심이 O
있으십니까 O
? O
AWS O
프로페셔널 O
서비스팀은 O
글로벌 O
AWS O
파트너를 O
관리하고 O
장기적인 O
파트너 O
전략을 O
개발하며 O
해당 O
파트너와 O
함께 O
전략을 O
실행할 O
Partner O
Enablement O
Manager를 O
채용하고 O
있습니다. O
Partner O
Manager는 O
거대한 O
규모와 O
높은 O
열정의 O
AWS O
파트너 O
네트워크 O
( O
APN O
) O
내에서 O

, O

Amazon O
S3 O
powers O

across O
the O
globe O
that O
make O
the O
lives O
of O
consumers O
better O
daily O
. O
Whether O
its O

, O

that O

working O
experience O
, O

. O

and O

. O
S3 O
Storage O
Control O
Plane O
is O
looking O
for O
a O

Manager O
to O

of O
next O
generation O

. O

S3 O

Amazon O
Elastic O
File O
System O
( O
EFS O
) O
https://aws.amazon.com/efs/ O
is O
built O
in O
Boston O
, O
MA O
and O
launched O
in O
2016 O
. O
It O
’s O
a O
fully O
managed O
service O
that O
makes O
it O
easy O
to O
set O
up O
and O
scale O
shared O
file O
storage O
in O
the O
AWS O
Cloud O
. O
Amazon O
EFS O
is O
designed O
for O
a O
wide O
variety O
of O
use O
cases O
: O
data O
analytics O
, O
video O
rendering O
, O
genomics O
analysis O
, O
web O
serving O
, O
content O
management O
, O
and O
home O
directories O
, O
to O
name O
a O
few O
. O
As O
a O
Software O
Development O
Manager O
on O
the O
EFS O
Storage O
team O
, O
you O
will O
lead O
a O
team O
designing O
, O
building O
, O
and O
operating O
a O
cloud O
native O
distributed O
storage O
system O
with O
petabyte O
- O
scale O
. O
Delivering O
reliable O
and O
high O
- O
performance O
services O
and O
features O
at O
AWS O
scale O
requires O
technical O
leaders O
with O
extraordinary O
expertise O
and O
boundless O
creativity O
. O
At O
Amazon O
, O
managers O
will O
interact O
with O
customers O
, O
understand O
our O
business O
goals O
, O
and O
innovate O
rapidly O
, O
delivering O
high O
- O
quality O
and O
ground O
- O
breaking O
functionality O
. O

. O

Amazon O
Web O
Services O
( O
AWS O
) O
is O
the O
world O
leader O
in O
providing O
a O
highly O
reliable O
, O
scalable O
, O
low O
- O
cost O
infrastructure O
platform O
in O
the O
cloud O
that O
powers O
tens O
of O
thousands O
of O
businesses O
worldwide O
! O
We O
are O
the O
Serverless O
Application O
Experience O
team O
. O
We O
own O
the O
developer O
experience O
that O
helps O
customers O
who O
want O
to O
build O
, O
operate O
, O
and O
govern O
serverless O
applications O
that O
span O
across O
multiple O
AWS O
services O
. O
We O
ensure O
customers O
have O
a O
great O
multi O
- O
service O
experience O
. O
Customers O
are O
excited O
by O
the O
vision O
of O
serverless O
: O
the O
ability O
to O
quickly O
deliver O
applications O
by O
writing O
new O
business O
logic O
without O
needing O
to O
become O
experts O
in O
computing O
and O
cloud O
operations O
. O
Compared O
to O
traditional O
architectures O
, O
customers O
increasingly O
build O
applications O
using O
a O
collection O
of O
services O
, O
delivering O
new O
applications O
by O
writing O
small O
amounts O
of O
business O
logic O
connected O
to O
other O
services O
. O
This O
new O
approach O
can O
be O
a O
challenge O
. O
Serverless O
applications O
are O
made O
up O
of O
many O
more O
parts O
than O
traditional O
applications O
, O
and O
those O
components O
and O
services O
need O
to O
be O
modeled O
and O
managed O
with O
tools O
, O
CI O
/ O
CD O
pipelines O
, O
and O
workflows O
. O
We O
believe O
this O
challenge O
of O
helping O
customers O
“ O
cross O
the O
chasm O
” O
into O
serverless O
is O
another O
opportunity O
to O
delight O
our O
customers O
and O
make O
them O
even O
more O
successful O
. O
We O
own O
the O
end O
- O
to O
- O
end O
experience O
, O
working O
across O
multiple O
services O
, O
for O
customers O
who O
want O
to O
build O
, O
operate O
, O
and O
govern O
serverless O
applications O
. O
We O
work O
closely O
with O
the O
service O
experience O
teams O
to O
deliver O
simple O
, O
powerful O
, O
and O
reliable O
tools O
to O
help O
customers O
get O
to O
production O
as O
quickly O
as O
possible O
. O
In O
other O
words O
, O
while O
each O
service O
( O
Lambda O
, O
API O
Gateway O
, O
EventBridge O
, O
SQS O
, O
etc O
. O
) O
will O
continue O
to O
their O
individual O
developer O
experience O
, O
this O
team O
will O
ensure O
customers O
have O
a O
great O
multi O
- O
service O
experience O
. O
We O
seek O
engineers O
to O

of O
tooling O
for O

Application O

Work O
/ O
Life O
Balance O

Our O
team O
puts O
a O
high O
value O
on O
work O
- O
live O
balance O
. O
It O
is O
n’t O
about O
how O
many O
hours O
you O
spend O
at O
home O
or O
at O
work O
; O
it O
’s O
about O
the O
flow O
you O
establish O
that O
brings O
energy O
to O
both O
parts O
of O
your O
life O
. O
We O
believe O
striking O
the O
right O
balance O
between O
your O
personal O
and O
professional O
life O
is O
critical O
to O
life O
- O
long O
happiness O
and O
fulfillment O
. O
We O
offer O
flexibility O
in O
working O
hours O
and O
encourage O
you O
to O
find O
your O
own O
balance O
between O
your O
work O
and O
personal O
lives O
. O
This O
position O
involves O
on O
- O
call O
responsibilities O
, O
typically O
for O
one O
week O
every O
two O
months O
. O
We O
do O
n’t O
like O
getting O
paged O
in O
the O
middle O
of O
the O
night O
or O
on O
the O
weekend O
, O
so O
we O
work O
to O
ensure O
that O
our O
systems O
are O
fault O
tolerant O
. O
When O
we O
do O
get O
paged O
, O
we O
work O
together O
to O
resolve O
the O
root O
cause O
so O
that O
we O
do O
n’t O
get O
paged O
for O
the O
same O
issue O
twice O
. O

The O
AWS O
App O
Mesh O
team O
is O
looking O
for O
software O
developers O
to O
join O
our O
rapidly O
growing O
team O
. O
In O
2019 O
, O
the O
App O
Mesh O
team O
launched O
a O
service O
that O
enabled O
our O
customers O
to O
declaratively O
define O
how O
their O
applications O
are O
connected O
, O
operated O
and O
secured O
. O
We O
have O
built O
a O
compute O
agnostic O
service O
mesh O
that O
works O
with O
Kubernetes O
, O
EKS O
, O
ECS O
, O
EC2 O
, O
and O
we O
plan O
on O
supporting O
more O
network O
resources O
in O
2020 O
. O
Our O
team O
has O
adopted O
an O
open O
product O
development O
roadmap O
( O
https://github.com/aws/aws-app-mesh-roadmap/issues O
) O
, O
and O
we O
are O
committed O
to O
contributing O
back O
to O
open O
source O
projects O
that O
we O
benefit O
from O
such O
as O
Envoy O
. O
We O
have O
built O
our O
services O
on O
the O
same O
technologies O
and O
infrastructure O
our O
customers O
use O
, O
including O
AWS O
Fargate O
, O
AWS O
Lambda O
, O
and O
Amazon O
EC2 O
. O
As O
we O
continue O
to O
grow O
our O
service O
and O
customers O
, O
we O
will O
be O
working O
to O
build O
new O
integrations O
, O
utilize O
more O
of O
AWS O
, O
and O
contribute O
more O
back O
to O
open O
source O
. O
As O
part O
of O
the O
AWS O
App O
Mesh O
team O
, O
you O
will O
be O
responsible O
for O
building O
our O
core O
services O
, O
integrating O
with O
other O
AWS O
technologies O
, O
contributing O
to O
open O
source O
software O
, O
and O
partnering O
with O
other O
services O
that O
our O
customers O
use O
today O
. O
Your O
work O
will O
help O
define O
the O

Team O

- O
Service O
( O

) O

on O

and O
OpenStack O
. O

develop O
and O
run O
different O
types O
of O
software O
services O
in O
15 O
regions O
around O
the O
globe O
– O
from O
classical O
compute O
, O
over O
object O
storage O
to O
Kubernetes O
as O
services O
. O

DESCRIPTION O
SAP O
started O
in O
1972 O
as O
a O
team O
of O
five O
colleagues O

a O
desire O
to O

something O
new O
. O

. O
Today O
, O

in O

. O
